main.name: Ashray A
main.description: where I develop, maintain and fix Software applications which leverages various modern-day technologies
main.bio: I am a fitness enthusiast, Nature lover at heart with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for organizing and management of daily life and passion for coding. Born in silicon city of India (Bengaluru) took an interest to gain technical knowledge on various concepts especially automation. Worked on various automation projects like Burgular alarm system, Vehile speedometer based on hall effect sensor and Various applications of Bluetooth sensor. I like to travel, natural monuments and historical places are some of my interests also I like to binge-watch at available chances.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

address.street: #800, 1st A Main, 1st A Cross, 2nd Phase, 7th Block, BSK 3rd Stage

resume.skillmessage: Knowledge on project management tools like Jira and Crucible Review, also additional knowledge on AWS EC2 and S3, Docker, Windows, Unix and linux based Operating Systems.

education.description: With a KCET rank of 32, I was accepted into a prestigious college. I learned a lot of things, particularly in non-technical areas, such as time management, money management, stress management, making acquintances or people skills, documentation, and communication. As part of the curriculum, I learned a variety of technical abilities.

Since I was very motivated to learn coding, I had a positive experience with learning computer science. Using simple frameworks like Visual Basic, HTML, C, and Java, I created a number of tiny apps. Developed a number of college-level projects along with documentation, in order to raise funds for master's degree studies.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Placed from college, joined as an Intern for 6 months and got converted to full time and have been working for more than a year, worked on various projects as an Intern also as a Full-time employee, Had an enormous learning curve with reference to SDLC process and project management process, With the guidance of outstanding mentors like Krishna and Amit learnt various aspects of coding like debugging which plays a major role in Software Engineer's role. Created a Python program to get the DDL commands executed in a particular timeframe using oracle Database and a simple frontend HTML page using python libraries to view it. Implemented a full END-END service feature using spring-boot and react using vue.js to determine and download service transaction logs. Implemented REST spring-boot service to display the data using graph database i.e., neo4j using cipher query language and Java. Daily monitoring of splunk to check cloud logs and finding appropriate fixes. Worked on creating data objects like macros to ease splunking. Worked on various services that runs on docker containers. Participation during code reviews using Tool like crucible

work.title: Intern Software Engineer/Advisor
work.description: Joined hands in collaboration with a friend on his startup and provided technical expertise on various aspects of software development. Led development of mobile app with a team of 3 to manipulate hardware leveraging Bluetooth connection using Android Studio and Gradle. Worked on IoT based projects using Aurdino UNO and Raspberry PI and learnt various aspects of Embedded C programming and Python. Created android application that can manipulate a refrigeration device along with a display to temperature and other factors using Mobile Application Development. Created an Android Application for Burglar alarm system.

testimonials.text: Entusiastic and active particpation in coding, Excellent Collaboration with team, sound technical knowledge, ability to find simpler path to solutions and a great company to be with on and off the record.

Partnered with Ashray and learnt a great deal about management, abilty to communicate is good. Smart in utilizing available resources to come up with suitable soutions. Always available to provide insight regarding any technical clarifications needed on the project
